title: Matchmaking does not work
body: 10 players in 1 game trash scum trolls/feeders on my team and the better half on the other every single game i try i lose i give up i lose doesn't matter because my team and only my team are shit and guess what none of them will ever get banned but if i call them trash i get punished

replies.body:
I'm getting the same. 
These people are just way too hard to carry. 

Mostly because they all legitimately believe afk farming wins games.
